	We are looking for a creative and passionate Female Content Creator to join ourteam.

	Plan and execute shoots, including styling, scripting, and editing.
	Track and report on content performance to guide future strategies.

	Strong understanding of social media trends and engagement strategies.
	Creative mindset with attention to detail and aesthetics.
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
	Passion for beauty, cosmetics, and skincare is a strong plus.


Salary
N150,000 Monthly.

Female Content Creator Job at Kuddy Cosmetics




        
    

        
        Kuddy Cosmetics exemplifies sustainable, homegrown success in Nigeria’s beauty sector—rising from a suitcase startup to a national brand with a loyal following, original product lines, extensive retail outlets, and digital innovation. Kudirat Fashola’s journey reflects tenacity, entrepreneurial ingenuity, and a vision that continues to shape Africa’s cosmetics industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Female Content Creator
Job Location: Tradefair, Amuwo Odofin - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a creative and passionate Female Content Creator to join ourteam.
	The ideal candidate is someone who loves beauty, social media, and storytelling.
	You will be responsible for creating engaging photo, video, and written content that promotes our products, builds brand awareness, and connects with our audience across all digital platforms.


Key Responsibilities


	Create high-quality, engaging content (photos, videos, reels, graphics) for social media, website, and campaigns.
	Develop creative ideas and concepts for product promotions, tutorials, influencer collaborations, and seasonal campaigns.
	Manage and grow the brand’s presence across social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, YouTube, etc.).
	Collaborate with the marketing and sales teams to align content with business goals.
	Monitor trends in beauty, skincare, and social media to keep content fresh and relevant.
	Plan and execute shoots, including styling, scripting, and editing.
	Track and report on content performance to guide future strategies.


Requirements


	Proven experience as a Content Creator, Social Media Manager, or similar role.
	Excellent skills in photography, videography, and editing (mobile or professional tools).
	Strong understanding of social media trends and engagement strategies.
	Creative mindset with attention to detail and aesthetics.
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
	Passion for beauty, cosmetics, and skincare is a strong plus.


Salary
N150,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and their portfolio to: careers@kuddycosmetics.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

	We are a renowned fashion brand, celebrated for blending cultural heritage with contemporary design.
	We are seeking a Managing Director (MD) to act as the commercial and operational engine for our next phase of growth.
	As the MD, you will have full P&amp;L responsibility, serving as the crucial link between a profound creative vision and a scalable, profitable business. Your mandate is to diagnose business health, architect efficient operations, and drive revenue.


Core Responsibilities
Business Strategy &amp; P&amp;L Ownership:


	Conduct full business diagnostics to identify growth levers and operational inefficiencies.

	Own the P&amp;L, with ultimate accountability for profitability and financial health.


Operational Excellence:


	Optimize the end-to-end supply chain, from production and inventory management to fulfillment.
	Streamline and scale all operational processes, including e-commerce and retail, while preserving quality.
	Lead, mentor, and scale the operations and finance teams.


Revenue Generation:


	Identify and execute new revenue streams through category expansion, new market entry, and partnerships.
	Drive commercial strategy, focusing on pricing, sales channels, and marketing to maximize growth.
	Analyze data to inform collection planning and optimize margins.

	A strategic problem-solver who respects brand heritage but is driven by business efficiency.
	A pragmatic builder who can create systems that allow creativity to flourish at scale.
	Commercially astute, with a proven ability to grow a desirable brand profitably.
	An exceptional leader who can bridge creative artistry and rigorous business management.

	Proven track record of owning a P&amp;L and driving significant revenue and profit growth.

Managing Director Job at HR Hive




        
    

        
        TheHRHive - Our client, a renonwed fashion brand, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Managing Director 

Job Location: Lagos (with potential travel)
Employment Type: Full-time

Mission of the Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are a renowned fashion brand, celebrated for blending cultural heritage with contemporary design.
	We are seeking a Managing Director (MD) to act as the commercial and operational engine for our next phase of growth.
	As the MD, you will have full P&L responsibility, serving as the crucial link between a profound creative vision and a scalable, profitable business. Your mandate is to diagnose business health, architect efficient operations, and drive revenue.


Core Responsibilities
Business Strategy & P&L Ownership:


	Conduct full business diagnostics to identify growth levers and operational inefficiencies.
	Develop and execute the integrated business strategy, annual budget, and forecasts.
	Own the P&L, with ultimate accountability for profitability and financial health.


Operational Excellence:


	Optimize the end-to-end supply chain, from production and inventory management to fulfillment.
	Streamline and scale all operational processes, including e-commerce and retail, while preserving quality.
	Lead, mentor, and scale the operations and finance teams.


Revenue Generation:


	Identify and execute new revenue streams through category expansion, new market entry, and partnerships.
	Drive commercial strategy, focusing on pricing, sales channels, and marketing to maximize growth.
	Analyze data to inform collection planning and optimize margins.


Who You Are


	A strategic problem-solver who respects brand heritage but is driven by business efficiency.
	A pragmatic builder who can create systems that allow creativity to flourish at scale.
	Commercially astute, with a proven ability to grow a desirable brand profitably.
	An exceptional leader who can bridge creative artistry and rigorous business management.


Qualifications & Experience


	10+ years in a Managing Director, COO, or General Manager role within the fashion, luxury, or tailored menswear industry.
	Proven track record of owning a P&L and driving significant revenue and profit growth.
	Deep expertise in fashion supply chain, inventory planning, and omnichannel strategy.
	Strong financial acumen and experience with budgeting and forecasting.
	Experience building and leading high-performing teams.


Renumeration


	A competitive executive compensation package.
	A foundational leadership role in a respected and growing brand with a powerful story.
	The rare opportunity to shape the business future of a brand at the intersection of culture and high fashion.
	The autonomy to build and implement your vision.


Application Closing Date
5th December, 2025.
